*************
Command *wc*
*************

Documentation for the wc command in */cmds/wiz/wc.c*.

Command
=======

 usage: wc [-lw] <filename(s)>

 Gives wordcount (and linecount) of the file specified.
 The 2 flags specify what to count :
-l = linecount only
-w = wordcount only
